documents.document: Hi @CanPowerLift thanks! Best wishes from me in Edinburgh :)
Hi @healthfitnut1 thanks! :)
Hi @DrKim4Health thanks! Best wishes :)
My #RecoveryFuel after #gym session tonight: water and more lasanga
Hi @beforetheorigin thanks! Back atya! :)
Me doing tricep raises : 6kg first set of 4, 12 reps each https://t.co/19QiS60U57
Hi @BodyBuildingMB thanks! Best wishes and happy training!! :) x
I'll let my dinner settle then head to the gym. Quads, triceps, ab-frame leg raises + v-sit crunches / oblique crunches, I'll take it slow
Slightly burnt #lasanga lol!! I'll leave it to cool a bit, still smells amazing!!! #weights #nutrition… https://t.co/ckGBopb8l2
Body fat % table with indications, excerpt from my Kindle book on Amazon, paperback coming soon - #weightloss… https://t.co/QgofRAf9bq
Home-made lasanga tonight for dinner in oven. Big plate - need to continue work on triceps, quads, back and biceps. #weights
There's some faux fur on @amazon I'll buy to make the costume,the most expensive things will be the bow & quiver #cosplay #BarbarianPrincess
Hi Mark @thinkm2 thanks! :)
Bows are pretty expensive though so I'll have to save up.I'll pop into #WonderlandEdinburgh Lothian Road to see if they have any I can buy
Hi @AdamBuschbacher thank you! Greetings from Edinburgh, Scotland! :)
I was told when I trained in #archery that the "2 finger salute" taunt came from archer war prisoners getting their two fingers cut off
If I was to use a long-bow I'd need to train my rear deltoids, rhomboids, trapezius and triceps hard because of the draw-strength required
Hi @Ultimate_Grip thank you! :)
Maybe I should get into #cosplay & help to inspire women and men to train in the gym? #WarriorPrincess #martialarts #archery #nutrition
It REALLY angers me that there seems to be very little publicity / market for #FemaleMuscle why do so many guys not like strong women?
I've not had sword training but I have instructed archery before at an outdoor centre so that and #martialarts would be my skills #Warriors
Faux fur bikini of course!! #WarriorPrincessGoals
I wonder where I can find a fur bikini lolol!!
I have a fantasy that I'm cast as the mature Red Sonja!!! Lolol! #BridgetNielson looked amazing in those films! #goals #WarriorPrincess
Hi @dottotech thanks!! :)
I need to increase my shoulder #flexibility flexibility is important & often neglected by body-builders ask ur gym trainer about PNF
When was the last time u played tennis / basketball / badminton? There are loads of sports clubs u can join to socialise & keep active
There are SO many sports that would be useful to include in ur training to encourage ur adherence to #exercise by varying ur routine
Ask ur gym trainer to refresh ur plan every month & remember its useful to include body-weight exercises in ur routine to keep it fresh/fun
Your weekly training schedule is dependent on ur goals. If u are looking to bulk-up it's best to train each muscle group just once a week.
It's a good plan to schedule a break of 1-2 weeks from ur training plan every 3 months to encourage muscle fibre repair & therefore bulk
As I'm starting back at the gym after 3 months break I'll reduce the weight for tricep raises from 10kg to 6kg so I can do more sets & reps
I need to get out more!!! Lol! Might get to the #gym today continuous battle with core-training & triceps. Need to work on back too
Loving the tunes on @PlanetRockRadio this morning but am I listening too much? Seems to have usurped the other stations I listen to! #Rock
Good morrow @HistoricalBook2 indeed it is a great pleasure to have you follow me. May ye have an awesome day! :)
Camomile infusion great to #hydrate & #destress tastes nice too,u could add a bit of honey.Put a drop of cold water in 1st then top up hot
You're welcome Chris! :) https://t.co/nmWk1Ee5KN
Well, yes!!! Lol!!! :) x https://t.co/jieIf9Qh4k
Hi @CarrickCross thanks! :)
Hi Chris! You're welcome! Yes indeed! If there's anything I can do to help please let me know!! :) https://t.co/WCAqp6h680
Wow feeling super weird listening to @PlanetRockRadio sorry guys I'll be cheering myself up with @heatradio for a while!! Lol! Thanks :)
Thanks @BlackwellEdin I hope you sell the rest of my poetry books!! Best wishes :)
I trained by punching harling walls,similar to the one in my profile picture,I don't recommend this as it hurts like hell lol! #MartialArts
I am strong I am intelligent I am worthy of respect #MOTIVATIONMONDAY
A True Master builds confidence, keeps calm and encourages physical #strength yet gentleness in women and men
A True Master: Would never get angry; would never hurt unless they were attacked first.A True Master would never rape. #MartialArts #Respect
Thank you @Twitter for noticing I may have regretted that tweet. Bless you x
I'm developing my own #MartialArt based on the rapes I have experienced in the past,similar to #WingChun https://t.co/QU8ODteE4b
#Metallica's Wherever I May Roam got me through some extremely horrible #homeless times, it's not just a song to me. They'll never know...
Yo @CreationEditor would u like to help me make a wee thank you vid for @Metallica using this tune,please? https://t.co/iTyxKfbSTY #fitness
I wrote this just now - #RapLyrics possibly or just a wee insightful #poem - Mission : Possible https://t.co/Q8v4WCFz4C
focus on the basics - breakfast and water - dairy will make me more sleepy so I avoid that during the day except for in tea & coffee
I'm feeling pretty good despite being up too early,sleep is SO important, at least I've had a few hours though. I might go to the #gym later
Hi @walkamileuk I've seen info about your work! Very impressive! I hope you are well!! Keep it up!! #respect
Hi @walkamileuk @mercians thank you! I hope you've both had an ok sleep and feel ok.
Up too early and smoking, gawd I hate fags #cravings I seem to have had a better quality of sleep though so dont feel too bad #stopsmoking
#LyricWritingPrompt - what do u see, how does it make you feel, who would u like to go there with with and why https://t.co/SiolFLMqv7
I used to run #poetry writing groups as a volunteer.I don't claim to be an expert but #art inspires me to write more interesting work I hope
#LyricWritingPrompt - The Victory - by Irish artist Phoebe Anna Traquair - What do you see and how does it make u… https://t.co/4p4RSe8te3
Reminds me of a ceilidh!
Wow now that's lyrics and singing!!!
When I'm tweeting I'm not smoking, it's a distraction but I should be more discerning with who I follow back. @TheRock doesn't follow anyone
Should have gone to @ShorePoets tonight to get out of the fecking house and get #IntellectualStimulation Bored as f#@&
#MakeLoveNotWar yes I'm a recovering hippy!!! :) lol! #BridgeOfSpies seems very Americanised but obviously trying to be "good propaganda"
Wow I never realised it was the guys from Abba that wrote Chess! Dunno why I thought it was Andrew Lloyd Weber #BridgeOfSpies is a good film
A game of Chess would be good just now. I like being white. Was it Andrew Lloyd Weber who wrote the musical, can't remember, I'll @Google
We are but pawns in the World-Leaders game of Military chess, #mediapropaganda is evil one of the reasons I don't own a #tv
My poem Alignment of hearts on #youtube #love #Romance #poetry #EmotionalIntelligence #emotionalEloquence https://t.co/8d4B8a7mEt
There's some serious filth on twitter.Warning: I've reported certain tweets to the police before & I would do it again #respect
I'm strangely rather perturbed by the apparent shortage of #courgettes in this country atm. It's causing me no little consternation #dinner
Rather nice #WorkoutTune for your Sunday routine - @rivalsons Thundering voices - I heard this on @PlanetRockRadio https://t.co/J4dYqZ3Ok9
And she knows it, but ahm ganna take it back...?
Hi @RealRunRyan thank you! Have fun on your journey, keep up the good work! :)
@CalvinHarris please listen to @PlanetRockRadio I'm a fan but your stuff all sounds the same, vary the rhythm ffs please!
The house smells of mackerel now,had it in pasta again for lunch with olives & extra virgin olive oil no salt, salt increases blood-pressure
Did u know that low blood sugar can cause anger, belligerence, depression and anxiety. I learned that at one of my first aid courses #lunch
Might go back to my local #KravMaga class, haven't been for a while and only did a couple of classes. Good self-defense skills included too
I feel the need to do more #martialarts to get out some pent up anger & get fitter
I plan to get back into instructing circuits and boxing circuit classes possibly chair-based exercise again too. Not sure when though
Sado masochism repulses me,I should have walked out of the first #50shades film it was that demeaning. NOT what women want. Not interested
#exercise is my salvation, my sanctuary and keeps me sane. I don't want to overdo it again tho, I was too manic, under-ate & got very ill.
Tonight : https://t.co/QBMLaPQ7Dy
If I trained seriously again I could get away with things like mince and dumplings,lamb casserole,steak etc more often.
Hi @FoodSharer thanks! :)
Got turkey strips to cook for a veg & beansprout stirfry tonight.Not keen on shop sauces I just use low-salt soy sauce.With fine egg noodles
#FoodPorn mince, beef suet dumplings, brocolli and roast potatoes!!! My Mum makes the best dumplings!! :)
Omg! #U2 I saw them live at #CelticPark in 1993!! Effing incredible!! Got their album War on CD, Rattle & Hum is effing amazing!!!
No bananas left, prob just as well cos I needed something more substantial so I had tahini on a wrap. Need to make more hummus.I love hummus
#ExerciseAnorexia is a serious issue. I didnt want to eat any meat for animal ethics reasons I was #vegan & I suffered physically & mentally
Back in the days when I regularly ran 16 miles cross-country around The Pentland's I should've had steak,veg & chips regularly. #anorexia
Frosty underfoot had to be v. Careful & avoid hill (thats my excuse :) feel great now! 2 glasses water, sultanas &… https://t.co/qAjAB3DFIE
F@$& it I'm going on a longer hillier route thats better lit with streetlights rather than my usual route I NEED TO RUN YEEEEE HAAAAAA!!!!!!
Breakfast part 2 : 3 teaspoons of egg mayo for a bit of #protein .It better ne light soon so my #carbs intake is at it's optimum efficiency
C'mon I'm all geared up to jog/run but it's too dark still!!! I NEED to run.......
My #Vangelis China Album was an heirloom. Apparently it's the Year Of The #Rooster in the Chinese Calender. I love the wee bit about Li Po
I wonder who inspired who between #PinkFloyd & #Vangelis I have The China album on vinyl up at my folks place.I'll listen to more Pink Floyd
Breakfast - big bowl of cornflakes with @rudehealth brown rice-milk which is good for slow-release #energy & wont make me sleepy like dairy
Not keen on the dark mornings at this time of year.
Hi @dikeough thanks! :)
Hi @SpitFireSpotify thank you! :)
